name: The Undying
description:
Kill all the zombies and enemies and run down the timer to survive and win the game.

A project my groupmates and I created as part of our assignment. A 3D first-person shooter set in an abandoned town. Improvements will be implemented in the near future.

Controls

- WASD to move.

- Left click to shoot.

- Press left shift to sprint

- Press space bar to jump.

-Press E to equip gun

-Press Q to throw gun
